foods.name: Doro wot
foods.description: Marinate chicken pieces with half of onions, garlic, ginger, paprika, cumin, coriander, cardamom, and salt. Melt niter kibbeh, sauté remaining onions, garlic, ginger; add berbere spice, then brown marinated chicken. Pour chicken broth/water, simmer covered for 45 mins - 1 hour. Adjust seasoning, add hard-boiled eggs if desired. Serve with injera or rice.
